entry: Tapatio like Cholula, or Tobasco is a common hot sauce that you will find most places you go in the US. But, just because its a common go-to mild hot sauce, does that mean its bad? Or does it deserve recognition as one of the best?

product: Birdseye Charred Chive Dulse Hot Sauce by Marshall's Haute Sauce
entry: This unique recipe was inspired by Southeast Asian flavors, with deep umami from white miso, dulse seaweed and roasted garlic.
Pretty sure everyone who has enjoyed or made wings at some point has tried this. For wings staple, I still think its really good!

product: Guajillo & Red Jalapeno Hot Sauce by Humble House
entry: Cant get enough of this sauce, I think I have ordered 4 bottles over the last year since I keep running out.
